meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fortunate.
meanings.sent1: Her fortunatenesses brought her many blessings in life.
meanings.sent2: His fortunatenesses seemed to never end, always finding luck in everything he did.
meanings.sent3: Despite her clumsiness, her fortunatenesses always saved her from harm.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, her fortunatenesses were like a shield protecting her from misfortune.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile on her face reflected her fortunatenesses for all to see.

meanings.definition: The condition of having good luck or being favored by fortune.
meanings.sent1: The fortunatenesses of winning the lottery changed his life forever.
meanings.sent2: She felt grateful for the fortunatenesses that allowed her to meet her soulmate.
meanings.sent3: His fortunatenesses in finding four-leaf clovers became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The fortunatenesses of the weather clearing up for the wedding felt like a miracle.
meanings.sent5: The fortunatenesses of the stars aligning perfectly made her believe in destiny.
